titles.title: A resolution to honor Mohammed Sedik Benyahia.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Expresses gratitude to the memory of Mohammed Sedik Benyahia for his role in negotiating the release of the U.S. hostages in Iran.
